Name: Accelerated Blast
Description: The Accelerated Blast mod increases the fire rate of Shotguns by 15% and  Puncture damage by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3 for both values.

Name: Ammo Stock
Description: The Ammo Stock mod increases shotgun magazine capacity by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

Name: Blaze
Description: Blaze increases both overall damage and  Heat damage to shotguns by 15% per rank, at a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

Name: Blunderbuss
Description: The Blunderbuss increases critical chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

Name: Bounty Hunter
Description: Bounty Hunter is PvP-exclusive a shotgun mod which causes targets hit by shotguns to be temporarily visible on the minimap.

Name: Breach Loader
Description: The Breach Loader mod increases  Puncture damage of a shotgun by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at Rank 5.

Name: Broad Eye
Description: Broad Eye is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that decreases zoom during Aim Glide.

Name: Burdened Magazine
Description: Burdened Magazine increases magazine capacity while reducing the reload speed of Shotguns.

Name: Charged Shell
Description: Charged Shell increases the  Electricity damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

Name: Chilling Grasp
Description: The Chilling Grasp mod increases  Cold damage on shotguns by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5. The picture shows a Frost with a Strun, and a frozen Corpus Crewman.

Name: Chilling Reload
Description: Chilling Reload increases  Cold damage and Reload Speed of Shotguns.

Name: Cleanse Corpus
Description: The Cleanse Corpus mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Corpus by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

Name: Cleanse Grineer
Description: The Cleanse Grineer mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Grineer by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

Name: Cleanse Infested
Description: The Cleanse Infested mod increases the base damage of shotguns against Infested by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

Name: Contagious Spread
Description: Contagious Spread increases the  Toxin damage on a Shotgun Weapon.

Name: Crash Shot
Description: Crash Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Impact damage.

Name: Critical Deceleration
Description: The Critical Deceleration mod increases the critical hit chance by 8% per rank while reducing the Fire Rate by -5% per rank of shotguns for a maximum of 48% critical hit chance and -30% fire rate at rank 5.

Name: Disruptor
Description: Disruptor increases the  Impact damage of Shotguns.

Name: Double-Barrel Drift
Description: Double-Barrel Drift is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reduces recoil and spread when firing while sliding.

Name: Fatal Acceleration
Description: Fatal Acceleration increases flight speed of Shotgun rounds.

Name: Flak Shot
Description: Flak Shot is a PvP exclusive shotgun mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Slash damage.

Name: Flechette
Description: Flechette increases the  Puncture damage of shotguns.

Name: Frail Momentum
Description: Frail Momentum is a Corrupted Mod that increases the Fire Rate of shotguns at the cost of damage by 15% and -2.5% per rank at a maximum of 90% and -15% at rank 5, respectively.

Name: Frigid Blast
Description: The Frigid Blast mod increases both the  Cold damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

Name: Full Contact
Description: The Full Contact mod increases  Impact damage of shotguns by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

Name: Hell's Chamber
Description: Hell's Chamber increases the Multishot percentage of Shotguns.

Name: Hydraulic Chamber
Description: Hydraulic Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which reduces weapon recoil at the cost of reduced magazine capacity.

Name: Incendiary Coat
Description: The Incendiary Coat mod increases  Heat damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

Name: Kill Switch
Description: Kill Switch is PvP-exclusive Shotgun mod which increases Reload Speed on Kills.

Name: Laser Sight
Description: Laser Sight is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Critical chance while aiming for a brief time upon a headshot.

Name: Lingering Torment
Description: Lingering Torment increases the duration of Status Effects inflicted by Shotguns.

Name: Loaded Capacity
Description: Loaded Capacity is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants increased magazine capacity at the cost of reduced reload speed.

Name: Lock and Load
Description: Lock and Load is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that reloads a portion of a shotgun's magazine for each second it is holstered.

Name: Loose Chamber
Description: Loose Chamber is a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod which grants improved reload speed at the cost of increased recoil.

Name: Momentary Pause
Description: Momentary Pause was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore health on kill.

Name: Nano-Applicator
Description: Nano-Applicator is a rare Shotgun mod that increases Status chance while aiming for a brief time after casting an ability.

Name: Narrow Barrel
Description: Narrow Barrel is a shotgun mod that temporarily increases accuracy while aiming upon hitting an enemy.

Name: Point Blank
Description: The Point Blank mod increases the base damage of a shotgun by 15% per rank at a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

Name: Primed Point Blank
Description: Primed Point Blank is the Primed version of the Point Blank mod that increases a shotgun's base damage.

Name: Primed Ravage
Description: Primed Ravage increases the Critical Damage of a shotgun and is a direct upgrade to the Ravage mod.

Name: Primed Shotgun Ammo Mutation
Description: Primed Shotgun Ammo Mutation is the Primed version of the Shotgun Ammo Mutation mod for shotguns, which converts any unused ammo type into Shotgun Ammo. The affected shotgun will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

Name: Prize Kill
Description: Prize Kill was a PvP-exclusive shotgun mod that gave a chance to restore shields on kill.

Name: Ravage
Description: The Ravage mod increases the critical damage of a shotgun by 10% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 5.

Name: Repeater Clip
Description: Repeater Clip is an uncommon Shotgun mod that increases Fire Rate while aiming for a brief time upon reloading.

Name: Scattering Inferno
Description: The Scattering Inferno mod increases both the  Heat damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

Name: Seeking Force
Description: The Seeking Force mod increases Punch Through of a shotgun starting at 0.4 meters, with a maximum of 2.1 meters at rank 5.

Name: Seeking Fury
Description: Seeking Fury is a Nightmare Mode shotgun mod that increases Reload Speed and adds Punch Through.

Name: Shell Compression
Description: The Shell Compression mod increases maximum ammo of a shotgun by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

Name: Shell Shock
Description: The Shell Shock mod increases both the  Electricity damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

Name: Shotgun Ammo Mutation
Description: Shotgun Ammo Mutation is a shotgun mod that converts any unused ammo type into Shotgun Ammo. The affected shotgun will only convert ammo while equipped, and will not convert any ammo type used by holstered secondary weapons until their own ammo is full.

Name: Shotgun Savvy
Description: Shotgun Savvy increases Shotgun Status Chance.

Name: Shotgun Spazz
Description: The Shotgun Spazz mod increases fire rate of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 90% at rank 5.

Name: Shrapnel Shot
Description: Shrapnel Shot is a common Shotgun mod that increases Critical damage while aiming for a brief time upon a kill.

Name: Shredder
Description: Shredder increases  Slash Damage for Shotgun by 5% to a maximum of 30%.

Name: Shred Shot
Description: Shred Shot is a PvP exclusive Shotgun Mod that converts an amount of physical damage to Puncture damage.

Name: Silent Battery
Description: The Silent Battery mod reduces Noise Level on shotguns. At max rank, it renders any shotgun completely silent and undetectable while firing.

Name: Snap Shot
Description: Snap Shot is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases movement speed while aiming.

Name: Soft Hands
Description: Soft Hands is a shotgun mod usable in both PvE and PvP that increases the holster rate of shotguns.

Name: Sweeping Serration
Description: The Sweeping Serration mod increases  Slash damage of a shotgun by 20% per rank for a maximum of 120% at rank 5.

Name: Tactical Pump
Description: The Tactical Pump mod increases reload speed of a shotgun by 5% per rank for a maximum of 30% at rank 5.

Name: Tainted Shell
Description: The Tainted Shell mod reduces the spread of Shotgun fire by -7% per rank while also decreasing the fire rate by -5% per rank for a maximum of reduced spread by -77% and reduced fire rate by -55% at rank 10.

Name: Toxic Barrage
Description: The Toxic Barrage mod increases both the  Toxin damage and Status Chance of a shotgun by 15% per rank for a maximum of 60% at rank 3.

Name: Vicious Spread
Description: Vicious Spread increases the damage and spread of shotguns by 15% and 10% per rank to a maximum of 90% and 60% at Rank 5, respectively.
